title: Missing woman Deborah Pilgrim: Police and SES search near Sedan
text:
Police and SES volunteers have scoured an area of scrubland on the eastern side of the Mount Lofty Ranges after a woman went missing.

Deborah Pilgrim, 55, was last seen at 6am yesterday morning at a campsite on Pearce Rd in Sedan, 1km west of Dry Weather Rd.

media_camera Police are seeking the assistance of the public to help locate missing Surrey Downs woman Deborah Pilgrim. Picture: SA Police

She was camping with her partner and friends when she went missing in dense scrubland.

A search was launched for Mrs Pilgrim in the hours after she was last seen but no trace has been found of her.

Police and family hold concerns for Mrs Pilgrim’s welfare as she suffers a medical condition.

She is described as caucasian, slim build, 163cm tall and approximately 55kg. She was last seen wearing blue jeans and a black shirt.

Anyone who may have seen Mrs Pilgrim in the Sedan area on Sunday morning is asked to contact the Police Assistance Line on 131 444.
description: Investigations are continuing into the disappearance of a woman from a campground in the Mount Lofty Ranges.
